properties.entry: SELECT ROWNUM , DD.* FROM( SELECT CC.* , MM.ANIMAL_PROFILE_IMG FROM (SELECT CC.*, ANIMAL_NO, ANIMAL_NAME,ANIMAL_VARIETY, ANIMAL_SEX, ANIMAL_BIRTH, ANIMAL_CATEGORY_NM FROM( SELECT MEMBER_NO , SUM(POINT_SCORE) TOTALP FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) CC LEFT JOIN ANIMAL ANI ON (ANI.MEMBER_NO=CC.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_CATEGORY CATE ON (CATE.ANIMAL_CATEGORY_CD=ANI.ANIMAL_CATEGORY_CD)) CC JOIN MEMBER MM ON(MM.MEMBER_NO = CC.MEMBER_NO)) DD WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7 ORDER BY TOTALP DESC

SELECT SUM(CHECKWALK) COUNT, CREATE_DT DAY FROM (SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) CHECKWALK , TO_NUMBER( TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'DD') ) CREATE_DT FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND STATUS_CD =1 AND BOARD_CD = 100 AND CREATE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(?) and TO_DATE(?) GROUP BY CREATE_DT) GROUP BY CREATE_DT ORDER BY CREATE_DT

SELECT DD.*, C.ANIMAL_NAME FROM (SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT_SCORE) TOTALP FROM POINT JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? GROUP BY MEMBER_NO ORDER BY TOTALP) DD LEFT JOIN ANIMAL C ON (C.MEMBER_NO = DD.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_IMG D ON (C.ANIMAL_NO = D.ANIMAL_NO)
SELECT ROWNUM MYRANK FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, SUM(POINT_SCORE) TOTALP FROM POINT GROUP BY MEMBER_NO) BB WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
